eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian

Class ParallelSVB

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.amidst.core.learning.parametric.bayesian.ParallelSVB
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm, ParameterLearningAlgorithm

    public class ParallelSVB
extends java.lang.Object
implements BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm
    This class implements the BayesianParameterLearningAlgorithm interface. It defines the parallel implementation of the Streaming Variational Bayes (SVB) algorithm.

    For an example of use follow this link http://amidst.github.io/toolbox/CodeExamples.html#psvbexample
